item.title: Imperial host the Central London Chess Congress
item.author: Francesco Salerno,Thomas Donaldson,
item.description: Twice a year since 2011, a grey, victory-hungry horde has descended on Beit. The reason: The Central London Chess Congress. For amateurs and masters alike, the tournament has become an important and much-loved fixture in London’s Chess calendar. Chess is ostensibly a quiet game, but don’t be fooled. …
